import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add Peers/Persistent Peers (unsafe)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/dial_peers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Set a persistent peer, this route in under unsafe, and has to manually enabled to use.

**Example:** curl 'localhost:26657/dial_peers?peers=\["f9baeaa15fedf5e1ef7448dd60f46c01f1a9e9c4@1.2.3.4:26656","0491d373a8e0fcf1023aaf18c51d6a1d0d4f31bd@5.6.7.8:26656"\]&persistent=false'


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"persistent","description":"Have the peers you are dialing be persistent","schema":{"type":"boolean","example":true}},{"in":"query","name":"unconditional","description":"Have the peers you are dialing be unconditional","schema":{"type":"boolean","example":true}},{"in":"query","name":"private","description":"Have the peers you are dialing be private","schema":{"type":"boolean","example":true}},{"in":"query","name":"peers","description":"array of peers to dial","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"f9baeaa15fedf5e1ef7448dd60f46c01f1a9e9c4@1.2.3.4:26656"}}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Dialing seeds in progress. See /net_info for details","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Log":{"type":"string","example":"Dialing seeds in progress. See /net_info for details"}},"title":"dialResp"}}}},"500":{"description":"empty error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Error Response","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","example":0},"jsonrpc":{"type":"string","example":"2.0"}},"title":"JSONRPC"},{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Description of failure"}}}],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
